metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12474 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Telegram Desktop through 2.0.1, Telegram through 6.0.1 for Android, and Telegram through 6.0.1 for iOS allow an IDN Homograph attack via Punycode in a public URL or a group chat invitation URL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12474` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

telegram-desktop - 2.1.0+ds-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: telegram-desktop package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.0+ds-1').
